titles: The Westminster lovers. Lovers passion is so violent, beyond all opposition, it makes poor lovers of lament, their sad distress'd condition. To the tune of Russels farewell.
publisher: Printed for P. Brooksby, at the golden-ball, in pye-corner,
notes: Reproduction of original in the British Library.
